summary: A young graduate student is tormented by a stalker who hacks into her electronic devices and monitors her every move.
cast: Ashley Benson|Matt McGorry|Kaili Vernoff|Rebecca Naomi Jones|Alex Cranmer|Michael William Freeman|John Anderson|Dylan Chalfy|Jeremy Fiorentino|Karl Glusman|Jon Bass|Tali Custer|Lola Hazim|Ted Koch|Jason Kolotouros
keywords: based on short film|found footage|stalker|laptop|cell phone
title: Ratter
